title: A New Contender To The LP Graphics Card Throne
description: Gigabyte launched a low profile version of the RTX 4060 and its a monster.  Get some AWESOME Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Play some Minecraft on the Dawid Does Minecraft server courtesy of our friends at Linode!
